name: OSINT for Cyber Threats
description: Leveraging open-source intelligence to identify and monitor cyber threats.

cards.title: Gathering Threat Intelligence from Public Sources
cards.description: Using OSINT techniques to track and analyze cyber threats.
cards.bulletpoints: WHOIS Lookup, DNS Enumeration, Social Media Threat Monitoring
cards.summaryText: Mine public footprints to spot brewing cyber hits before they land.

cards.title: Analyzing and Correlating OSINT Data
cards.description: Building threat intelligence reports from collected OSINT data.
cards.bulletpoints: Data Cross-Referencing, Threat Correlation, Attribution Analysis
cards.summaryText: Fuse open data streams into coherent threat stories teams can act on.
